text: A Blueprint for Murder is a 1953 American crime thriller movie directed by Andrew L. Stone and starring Joseph Cotten, Jean Peters, Gary Merrill, Catherine McLeod, Barney Phillips, Jack Kruschen. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 crime movies Category:1953 thriller movies Category:1950s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Andrew L. Stone Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: A Blueprint for Murder
